name: GKPeerConnectionState
desc: The state of a peer known to the session.

items.name: case stateAvailable
items.desc: A peer not connected to the session, but one that the session can connect to.

items.name: case stateUnavailable
items.desc: A peer that is no longer interested in receiving connections.

items.name: case stateConnected
items.desc: A peer connected to the session.

items.name: case stateDisconnected
items.desc: A peer that disconnected from the session.

items.name: case stateConnecting
items.desc: A peer attempting to connect to the session.
